title: Spencer Matthews and Vogue Williams didn’t invite family to second wedding
text:
Spencer and Vogue tied the knot for the second time (Picture: Getty Images)

Spencer Matthews and Vogue Williams have revealed they didn’t invite their families to their second wedding celebration.

The happy couple, who beat Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin to the punch by celebrating tying the knot for a second time in September, explained that it was a much more casual affair this time round.

‘It was more like the second day of the wedding, we wanted it to be a big party because we didn’t have any of our friends at the first wedding – family weren’t invited’, Vogue told New magazine.

It meant Spencer’s brother James and Pippa Middleton were nowhere to be seen after they got married back in 2017.
description: Spencer Matthews and Vogue Williams didn't invite family to second wedding as Made In Chelsea co-star Jamie Laing officiated.
